languages.text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?
languages.original_text: Что выберете вы? С честью удалить сохранение или продолжить игру без достижения "Есть только война..." и особой награды?

traits.locale_text: What will you choose? Delete your your save with honor or continue the game, but without the Grim Darkness achievement?
What will you choose? Delete your save with honour or continue the game without the "There Is Only War..." achievement and the special reward?
What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?
What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?
What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

languages.text: Что выберете вы? С честью удалить сохранение или продолжить игру без достижения "Есть только война..." и особой награды?
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: Какое решение вы примете? Удалить своё сохранение с честью или продолжить игру, но без достижения "Мрачная Тьма"?
Что выберете вы? С честью удалить сохранение или продолжить игру без достижения "Есть только война..." и особой награды?
Что выберете вы? С честью удалить сохранение или продолжить игру без достижения "Есть только война..." и особой награды?

languages.text: ¿Qué prefieres? ¿Actuar con honor y eliminar tu guardado o continuar la partida sin poder conseguir el logro «Solo existe la guerra...» ni la recompensa especial?
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: ¿Qué prefieres? ¿Actuar con honor y eliminar tu guardado o continuar la partida sin poder conseguir el logro «Solo existe la guerra...» ni la recompensa especial?

languages.text: あなたの選択は？名誉を胸にセーブを削除して進むか、それとも実績「全ては戦なり…」と特別報酬が手に入るチャンスを捨ててゲームを続けるか、さぁどちら？
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: あなたの選択は？名誉を胸にセーブを削除して進むか、それとも実績「全ては戦なり…」と特別報酬が手に入るチャンスを捨ててゲームを続けるか、さぁどちら？

languages.text: 您会如何选择？是心怀荣耀删除存档，还是继续进行游戏，但再也无法解锁“唯有战争……”这个成就与特别奖励？
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: 您会如何选择？是心怀荣耀删除存档，还是继续进行游戏，但再也无法解锁“唯有战争……”这个成就与特别奖励？

languages.text: Wofür entscheidest du dich? Möchtest du ehrenhaft fortfahren und deinen Spielstand löschen oder setzt du das Spiel ohne die Chance auf den Erhalt des Erfolges 'Es gibt nur Krieg ...' und eine besondere Belohnung fort?
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: Wofür entscheidest du dich? Möchtest du ehrenhaft fortfahren und deinen Spielstand löschen oder setzt du das Spiel ohne die Chance auf den Erhalt des Erfolges 'Es gibt nur Krieg ...' und eine besondere Belohnung fort?

languages.text: Que comptez-vous faire ? Défendre votre honneur en effaçant votre sauvegarde ou continuer la partie en renonçant au succès « La guerre est omniprésente... » et à la récompense spéciale correspondante ?
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?

traits.locale_text: Que comptez-vous faire ? Défendre votre honneur en effaçant votre sauvegarde ou continuer la partie en renonçant au succès « La guerre est omniprésente... » et à la récompense spéciale correspondante ?

Que comptez-vous faire ? Défendre votre honneur en effaçant votre sauvegarde ou continuer la partie en renonçant au succès « La guerre est omniprésente... » et à la récompense spéciale correspondante ?

languages.text: Seçimin nedir? Şerefini koruyup kaydını silecek misin, yoksa "Yalnızca Savaş Var" başarımından ve özel bir ödülden vazgeçip oyuna devam mı edeceksin?
languages.original_text: What will you choose? Proceed with honour and delete your save or continue the game without the possibility of receiving the "There Is Only War..." achievement and a special reward?
